channel.title: Xie Nanxing on Artangled

item.title: Xie Nanxing - A Gift Like Kung Pao Chicken | Thomas Dane Gallery
item.description: This show wasn’t exactly appealing to me as I can’t stand the volcanically spicy Sichuan dish it’s named after, but Xie Nanxing soon put my prejudices (and stomach) to rest. The reason for the name is the bright colours of kung pao chicken, and accordingly the walls of Thomas Dane are painted in greens and pinks. The similarities to the chicken dish end there. Xie’s painting technique is known as ‘canvas print’.
